configuration-parameters.description: No of active partitions
configuration-parameters.name: ActivePartitionCount

configuration-parameters.description: Interval between collection of nodes' addresses (seconds)
configuration-parameters.name: AddressCollectorInterval

configuration-parameters.description: Interval between advancing the AHM (seconds)
configuration-parameters.name: AdvanceAHMInterval

configuration-parameters.description: Consider backup epochs when setting new AHM
configuration-parameters.name: AHMBackupManagement

configuration-parameters.description: Allow names containing non-ASCII UTF-8 characters
configuration-parameters.name: AllowNonAsciiNames

configuration-parameters.description: Interval between Tuple Mover row count statistics updates (seconds)
configuration-parameters.name: AnalyzeRowCountInterval

configuration-parameters.description: Maximum number of columns to analyze with each analyze stats plan
configuration-parameters.name: AnalyzeStatsPlanMaxColumns

configuration-parameters.description: Number of sampling bands to use when not using entire data set.
configuration-parameters.name: AnalyzeStatsSampleBands

configuration-parameters.description: ARC will commit only if the change is more than the percentage specified
configuration-parameters.name: ARCCommitPercentage

configuration-parameters.description: The confidence level at which to run audits of license size utilization. Represent 99.5% as 99.5.
configuration-parameters.name: AuditConfidenceLevel

configuration-parameters.description: The error tolerance for audits of license size utilization. Represent 4.5% as 4.5.
configuration-parameters.name: AuditErrorTolerance

configuration-parameters.description: Use as recommended by Technical Support
configuration-parameters.name: BasicVerticaOptions

configuration-parameters.description: size of memory managed by memory manager (in MB)
configuration-parameters.name: BlockCacheSize

configuration-parameters.description: Buffer query output to allow possible retry of the query. Values allowed: 0(never buffer), 1(always buffer), 2(default: vertica decides before query begins executing to buffer based on certain criteria)
configuration-parameters.name: BufferQueryOutputForPossibleRetry

configuration-parameters.description: If set to 1, position index will be cached
configuration-parameters.name: CachePositionIndex

configuration-parameters.description: If true, cascade to a target resource pool will always lead to replanning the query on the target pool
configuration-parameters.name: CascadeResourcePoolAlwaysReplan

configuration-parameters.description: Split catalog checkpoint into chunks of approximately this size
configuration-parameters.name: CatalogCheckpointChunkSizeKB

configuration-parameters.description: Minimum transaction log size before a new catalog checkpoint is created
configuration-parameters.name: CatalogCheckpointMinLogSizeKB

configuration-parameters.description: Transaction log size must be at least this fraction of the checkpoint size before a new catalog checkpoint is created
configuration-parameters.name: CatalogCheckpointPercent

configuration-parameters.description: Rename storage files during final cleanup upon removal from the catalog
configuration-parameters.name: CatalogDeindexRename

configuration-parameters.description: Check data integrity using CRCs (should be enabled unless performance is adversely impacted
configuration-parameters.name: CheckCRCs

configuration-parameters.description: Check data sortedness before writing to ROS
configuration-parameters.name: CheckDataTargetSortOrder

configuration-parameters.description: Seconds to wait for 'late' nodes to finish recovery actions and proceed with the cluster
configuration-parameters.name: ClusterRecoveryWait

configuration-parameters.description: The collation function column width is 4 plus its data column width times CollationExpansion octets
configuration-parameters.name: CollationExpansion

configuration-parameters.description: Catalog compression (0: off, 1: chkpt+systxnlogs, 2: chkpt+txnlogs)
configuration-parameters.name: CompressCatalogOnDisk

configuration-parameters.description: When enabled, control traffic will be compressed
configuration-parameters.name: CompressDistCalls

configuration-parameters.description: When enabled, data traffic will be compressed; this reduces data bandwidth at a cost of CPU time
configuration-parameters.name: CompressNetworkData

configuration-parameters.description: Compute APPROXCOUNTDISTINCTs when analyzing statistics. Default is false
configuration-parameters.name: ComputeApproxNDVsDuringAnalyzeStats

configuration-parameters.description: Number of ROS containers that are allowed before new ROSs are prevented (ROS pushback)
configuration-parameters.name: ContainersPerProjectionLimit

configuration-parameters.description: When doing a COPY FROM VERTICA without an explicit columns list, include IDENTITY columns in the implicit list
configuration-parameters.name: CopyFromVerticaWithIdentity

configuration-parameters.description: Time interval in seconds after which a node sends a heartbeat (Set to 0 to disable.)
configuration-parameters.name: DatabaseHeartbeatInterval

configuration-parameters.description: Number of rows to be sampled for correlation analysis during DBD design. Default: 4500
configuration-parameters.name: DBDCorrelationSampleRowCount

configuration-parameters.description: Percentage of rows to be sampled for correlation analysis during DBD design. Default: 0 Use DBDCorrelationSampleRowCount
configuration-parameters.name: DBDCorrelationSampleRowPct

configuration-parameters.description: Number of rows to be sampled for count distinct analysis during DBD design. Default: 0 Use DBDCountDistinctSampleRowPct
configuration-parameters.name: DBDCountDistinctSampleRowCount

configuration-parameters.description: Percentage of rows to be sampled for count distinct analysis during DBD design. Default: 100
configuration-parameters.name: DBDCountDistinctSampleRowPct

configuration-parameters.description: Concurrency setting for the deployment/rebalance process in the DBD. Default: 0
configuration-parameters.name: DBDDeploymentParallelism

configuration-parameters.description: Dynamic sampling scheme to be used for encoding analysis during DBD design. Default: true
configuration-parameters.name: DBDDynamicSampling

configuration-parameters.description: Number of rows to be sampled for encoding analysis during DBD design. Default: 1000000
configuration-parameters.name: DBDEncodingSampleRowCount

configuration-parameters.description: Percentage of rows to be sampled for encoding analysis during DBD design. Default: 0 Use DBDEncodingSampleRowCount
configuration-parameters.name: DBDEncodingSampleRowPct

configuration-parameters.description: Number of minimum rows expected in Fact Table, default 1M rows
configuration-parameters.name: DBDLargestTableRowCountBoundary

configuration-parameters.description: Log internal DBD design process in DC tables. Default: false DC logging of design process is turned OFF by default
configuration-parameters.name: DBDLogInternalDesignProcess

configuration-parameters.description: Concurrency setting for the parallelism in the Storage Optimization phase of Database Designer. Default: 0
configuration-parameters.name: DBDMaxConcurrencyForEncodingExperiment

configuration-parameters.description: If the largest fact table has more than <DBDLargestTableRowCountBoundary> rows, then use this percentage off the largest fact table to define the number of rows below which a table should be replicated Default: 1%
configuration-parameters.name: DBDRepLargeRowCountPct

configuration-parameters.description: If the largest fact table has less than <DBDLargestTableRowCountBoundary> rows, then use this percentage off the largest fact table to define the number of rows below which a table should be replicated Default: 10%
configuration-parameters.name: DBDRepSmallRowCountPct

configuration-parameters.description: Number of bands sampled using Dynamic Sampling Algorithm. Default: 100
configuration-parameters.name: DBDSampleStorageBandCount

configuration-parameters.description: Number of rows to be sampled for segmentation skew analysis during DBD design. Default: 8000
configuration-parameters.name: DBDSkewDetectionSampleRowCount

configuration-parameters.description: Percentage of rows to be sampled for segmentation skew analysis during DBD design. Default: 0 Use DBDSkewDetectionSampleRowCount
configuration-parameters.name: DBDSkewDetectionSampleRowPct

configuration-parameters.description: Determines source for resource allocation during a designer invocation. Default: false Uses user's resource pool
configuration-parameters.name: DBDUseOnlyDesignerResourcePool

configuration-parameters.description: Default setting for intervalstyle; 1 is UNITS; 0 is PLAIN and conforms to standard SQL
configuration-parameters.name: DefaultIntervalStyle

configuration-parameters.description: Defines the default session startup Locale for the database
configuration-parameters.name: DefaultSessionLocale

configuration-parameters.description: Disable schema-level privileges on tables.
configuration-parameters.name: DisableInheritedPrivileges

configuration-parameters.description: Set to disable local resegmentation
configuration-parameters.name: DisableLocalResegmentation

configuration-parameters.description: If ‘false’, the optimizer randomly chooses nodes to do the work of any down nodes
configuration-parameters.name: DisableNodeDownOptimization

configuration-parameters.description: Do not allow creating prejoin projections
configuration-parameters.name: DisablePrejoinProjections

configuration-parameters.description: Disallow the MultipleActiveResultSets (MARS) feature to be enabled
configuration-parameters.name: DisallowMars

configuration-parameters.description: Interval between disk space polls (for disk resource management) (seconds)
configuration-parameters.name: DiskSpacePollingInterval

configuration-parameters.description: Enable DMLs to cancel conflicting TM tasks to acquire lock
configuration-parameters.name: DMLCancelTM

configuration-parameters.description: Use as recommended by Technical Support
configuration-parameters.name: EEVerticaOptions

configuration-parameters.description: Enables Access Policy feature
configuration-parameters.name: EnableAccessPolicy

configuration-parameters.description: Enable all granted roles on login
configuration-parameters.name: EnableAllRolesOnLogin

configuration-parameters.description: If true and apportionable source/parser are defined for the load, input may get split into multiple parts (portions) and loaded by multiple threads/servers in parallel
configuration-parameters.name: EnableApportionLoad

configuration-parameters.description: Turn on/off the automatic update row count, min and max when DML queries are run
configuration-parameters.name: EnableAutoDMLStats

configuration-parameters.description: A value of 1 enables block memory manager or 0 disables memory manager
configuration-parameters.name: EnableBlockMemoryManager

configuration-parameters.description: If true and a chunker is defined for the corresponding parser multiple parse threads can cooperate to parse the output of a single source
configuration-parameters.name: EnableCooperativeParse

configuration-parameters.description: Enable the usage data collector
configuration-parameters.name: EnableDataCollector

configuration-parameters.description: Enabled cipher suites for TLS
configuration-parameters.name: EnabledCipherSuites

configuration-parameters.description: Enable EE Thread Pool to reduce threads used
configuration-parameters.name: EnableEEThreadPool

configuration-parameters.description: Enable SIPS for early materialized merge join, on multi-block inners
configuration-parameters.name: EnableEMMJMultiblockSIPS

configuration-parameters.description: Allow expression results to be materialized as projection columns
configuration-parameters.name: EnableExprsInProjections

configuration-parameters.description: allow user-specified force outer rule
configuration-parameters.name: EnableForceOuter

configuration-parameters.description: Allow aggregate projections using GROUP BY
configuration-parameters.name: EnableGroupByProjections

configuration-parameters.description: Enable JIT compilation optimizations
configuration-parameters.name: EnableJIT

configuration-parameters.description: Determines whether new primary key constraints will be enabled by default
configuration-parameters.name: EnableNewPrimaryKeysByDefault

configuration-parameters.description: Determines whether new unique key constraints will be enabled by default
configuration-parameters.name: EnableNewUniqueKeysByDefault

configuration-parameters.description: Enable Parallel Hash build to improve join performance
configuration-parameters.name: EnableParallelHashBuild

configuration-parameters.description: Enable Parallel Sort to improve sort performance
configuration-parameters.name: EnableParallelSort

configuration-parameters.description: 0 if the special ANY_ROW event for pattern matching is not enabled. Otherwise it is enabled.
configuration-parameters.name: EnablePatternMatchingAnyRow

configuration-parameters.description: Enable Plan Stability Feature
configuration-parameters.name: EnablePlanStability

configuration-parameters.description: Execute active directed queries in Plan Stability Store
configuration-parameters.name: EnablePlanStabilityLookup

configuration-parameters.description: Query threads can be restricted to executing on specific CPUs via session resource pool attributes
configuration-parameters.name: EnableResourcePoolCPUAffinity

configuration-parameters.description: Enable runtime task priority scheduler to allow high priority queries to use more CPU time and IO bandwidth
configuration-parameters.name: EnableRuntimePriorityScheduler

configuration-parameters.description: Enable SSL for the server
configuration-parameters.name: EnableSSL

configuration-parameters.description: Enable bundling data files along with their index files. Also MaxBundleableROSSizeKB is effective when this is enabled.
configuration-parameters.name: EnableStorageBundling

configuration-parameters.description: Force casts from varchar to Time,TimeTz,Timestamp,TimestampTz,Interval to error instead of returning null
configuration-parameters.name: EnableStrictTimeCasts

configuration-parameters.description: Allow aggregate projections using Top K / LIMIT
configuration-parameters.name: EnableTopKProjections

configuration-parameters.description: Allow aggregate projections using UDTransforms
configuration-parameters.name: EnableUDTProjections

configuration-parameters.description: Enable optimizations based on guarantee of uniqueness
configuration-parameters.name: EnableUniquenessOptimization

configuration-parameters.description: If set to 1 total threads will be equal to number of virtual processors else thread will be set to total real core
configuration-parameters.name: EnableVirtualCoreCount

configuration-parameters.description: Granularity of time to epoch mapping (seconds)
configuration-parameters.name: EpochMapInterval

configuration-parameters.description: Warn of strings which use backslash quoting; using an E'...' escape string will avoid this warning
configuration-parameters.name: EscapeStringWarning

configuration-parameters.description: The number of bands or clusters to form when taking samples while executing evaluating_delete_performance().
configuration-parameters.name: EvaluateDeletePerformanceSampleStorageBandCount

configuration-parameters.description: The number of samples to take while executing evaluating_delete_performance().
configuration-parameters.name: EvaluateDeletePerformanceSampleStorageCount

configuration-parameters.description: Exclude ephemeral nodes in SELECT queries. Default is false
configuration-parameters.name: ExcludeEphemeralNodesInQueries

configuration-parameters.description: Maximum number of rejected/exceptions records that will be written while querying an external table. Default: 100, Unlimited: -1
configuration-parameters.name: ExternalTablesExceptionsLimit

configuration-parameters.description: Time interval to wait before replacing a DOWN node with a STANDBY node
configuration-parameters.name: FailoverToStandbyAfter

configuration-parameters.description: Maximum memory (in MB) for each UDx side process
configuration-parameters.name: FencedUDxMemoryLimitMB

configuration-parameters.description: Number of files (per projection) that are allowed before new ROSs are prevented (ROS pushback)
configuration-parameters.name: FilesPerProjectionLimit

configuration-parameters.description: Multiplier to pad the observed length of fields in flex tables when casting them to regular vs long types
configuration-parameters.name: FlexTableDataTypeGuessMultiplier

configuration-parameters.description: Default size of __raw__ column in flex tables
configuration-parameters.name: FlexTableRawSize

configuration-parameters.description: Force all UDx's to run in fenced mode
configuration-parameters.name: ForceUDxFencedMode

configuration-parameters.description: Ensure catalog durable on disk after each commit
configuration-parameters.name: FsyncCatalogForLuck

configuration-parameters.description: Call fsync after each data file is written
configuration-parameters.name: FsyncDataForLuck

configuration-parameters.description: Maximum amount of memory (in megabytes) that can be used by a single GROUP BY
configuration-parameters.name: GBHashMemCapMB

configuration-parameters.description: Enables profiling for all statements at the EE operator level
configuration-parameters.name: GlobalEEProfiling

configuration-parameters.description: A user who'll inherit objects of dropped users. Should be unset (blank) by default (opt-in)
configuration-parameters.name: GlobalHeirUsername

configuration-parameters.description: Enables profiling for all statements
configuration-parameters.name: GlobalQueryProfiling

configuration-parameters.description: Enables profiling for all sessions
configuration-parameters.name: GlobalSessionProfiling

configuration-parameters.description: When enabled, the hash prepass mode of the EE GroupGenerator operator will be used
configuration-parameters.name: GroupGeneratorHashingEnabled

configuration-parameters.description: Amount of time in seconds waiting for connection to WebHCat before abort
configuration-parameters.name: HCatConnectionTimeout

configuration-parameters.description: Name of the HCatalog User Defined Parser
configuration-parameters.name: HCatParserName

configuration-parameters.description: Slow transfer in bytes/sec limit lower than which transfer will abort after 'HCatSlowTransferTime' amount of time
configuration-parameters.name: HCatSlowTransferLimit

configuration-parameters.description: Amount of time allowed for transfer below slow transfer limit before abort
configuration-parameters.name: HCatSlowTransferTime

configuration-parameters.description: Name of the HCatalog User Defined Source
configuration-parameters.name: HCatSourceName

configuration-parameters.description: Name of the HCatalog webservice, used in constructing a url to query this service
configuration-parameters.name: HCatWebserviceName

configuration-parameters.description: Version of the HCatalog webservice, used in constructing a url to query this service
configuration-parameters.name: HCatWebserviceVersion

configuration-parameters.description: Upper bound on the number of epochs kept in the epoch map
configuration-parameters.name: HistoryRetentionEpochs

configuration-parameters.description: Number of seconds of epochs kept in the epoch map (seconds)
configuration-parameters.name: HistoryRetentionTime

configuration-parameters.description: Path to the java binary for executing UDx written in Java
configuration-parameters.name: JavaBinaryForUDx

configuration-parameters.description: Minimum heap size (in MB) for Java UDx side process
configuration-parameters.name: JavaSideProcessMinHeapSizeMB

configuration-parameters.description: Keep ROS Min/Max values on all columns. Enables some optimizations, at a cost of catalog space.
configuration-parameters.name: KeepMinMaxOnAllColumns

configuration-parameters.description: SNMP event when the LGE for the node lags more than LGELagThreshold seconds behind the last epoch close time
configuration-parameters.name: LGELagThreshold

configuration-parameters.description: Controls the maximum ROS output in data load; Negative and zero will be considerred as 1.
configuration-parameters.name: LoadMaxFinalROSCount

configuration-parameters.description: Time to wait for a table lock before giving up (seconds)
configuration-parameters.name: LockTimeout

configuration-parameters.description: Interval (in seconds) at which heartbeat messages are sent to vertica.log. (Set to 0 to disable.)
configuration-parameters.name: LogHeartbeatInterval

configuration-parameters.description: SNMP event LowDiskSpace is raised when disk utilization exceeds this percentage
configuration-parameters.name: LowDiskSpaceWarningPct

configuration-parameters.description: Max number of columns used in auto projection segmentation expression (0 is to use all columns)
configuration-parameters.name: MaxAutoSegColumns

configuration-parameters.description: ROS files which are smaller than this size (KB) are selected for bundling. '0' means bundling of separate ROS's is disabled, though pidx and fdb files of an individual ROS will be bundled if EnableStorageBundling is set. Maximum allowed size is 1024 (1048576 bytes)
configuration-parameters.name: MaxBundleableROSSizeKB

configuration-parameters.description: Maximum number of client sessions; in addition five dbadmin sessions are allowed
configuration-parameters.name: MaxClientSessions

configuration-parameters.description: Defines the no. of constraint violation checks per internal query in analyze_constraints(). Default is -1
configuration-parameters.name: MaxConstraintChecksPerQuery

configuration-parameters.description: Maximum file size for Data Collector logs in KB
configuration-parameters.name: MaxDataCollectorFileSize

configuration-parameters.description: Maximum desired size of an EE block (used to move tuples between operators), actual block size be larger (must have capacity for at least 2 rows)
configuration-parameters.name: MaxDesiredEEBlockSize

configuration-parameters.description: Maximum number of DVROSes attached to a single ROS container once reached dv merge out happens
configuration-parameters.name: MaxDVROSPerContainer

configuration-parameters.description: Maximum length of individual lines (entries) in the vertica.log log file. Longer lines are truncated. '0' means no limit.
configuration-parameters.name: MaxLogLineLength

configuration-parameters.description: The max ROS size in MB a merge out job can produce
configuration-parameters.name: MaxMrgOutROSSizeMB

configuration-parameters.description: Maximum amount of memory used by the Optimizer; Increasing this value may help with 'Optimizer memory use exceeds allowed limit' errors (MB)
configuration-parameters.name: MaxOptMemMB

configuration-parameters.description: Maximum amount of memory used by the Optimizer in the context of DBD; Increasing this value may help with 'Run Database Designer with more memory or increase Database Designer memory usage limit' errors (MB)
configuration-parameters.name: MaxOptMemMBInDBD

configuration-parameters.description: Maximum amount of memory allowed for parsing a single request; Increasing this value may help with 'Request size too big' errors (MB)
configuration-parameters.name: MaxParsedQuerySizeMB

configuration-parameters.description: Max no of partitions per projection
configuration-parameters.name: MaxPartitionCount

configuration-parameters.description: The number of times the system might try to re-run a query if the first run does not succeed.
configuration-parameters.name: MaxQueryRetries

configuration-parameters.description: # of failed attempts before recovery gives up
configuration-parameters.name: MaxRecoverErrors

configuration-parameters.description: Maximum number of historic passes made by Recovery before moving to the current pass where locks are taken
configuration-parameters.name: MaxRecoverHistoricPasses

configuration-parameters.description: # of failed attempts before refresh gives up
configuration-parameters.name: MaxRefreshErrors

configuration-parameters.description: Maximum number of historic passes made by Refresh before moving to the current pass where locks are taken
configuration-parameters.name: MaxRefreshHistoricPasses

configuration-parameters.description: Maximum of number of ROSes in a stratum once reached merge out happens
configuration-parameters.name: MaxROSPerStratum

configuration-parameters.description: Memory to allocate to per-node Merge Join
configuration-parameters.name: MergeJoinInnerInitialMB

configuration-parameters.description: If set to true cache will be used pick the projection for mergeout
configuration-parameters.name: MergeOutCache

configuration-parameters.description: Interval between Tuple Mover checks for mergeouts to perform (seconds)
configuration-parameters.name: MergeOutInterval

configuration-parameters.description: Minimum free before catalog writes are refused (MB) (Default(-1) is 1GB or 2% free)
configuration-parameters.name: MinimumCatalogDiskMegabytes

configuration-parameters.description: Minimum free before column data writes are refused (MB) (Default(-1) is 4GB or 5% free)
configuration-parameters.name: MinimumDataDiskMegabytes

configuration-parameters.description: Minimum free before temp data writes are refused (MB) (Default(-1) is 8GB or 10% free)
configuration-parameters.name: MinimumDataDiskTempMegabytes

configuration-parameters.description: Minimum size of the inner input to a join that will trigger the Optimizer to attempt a sort merge join (MB)
configuration-parameters.name: MinSortMergeJoinMB

configuration-parameters.description: Interval between Tuple Mover checks for moveouts to perform (seconds)
configuration-parameters.name: MoveOutInterval

configuration-parameters.description: The number of epochs data resides in WOS before the Tuple Mover triggers a moveout based on age
configuration-parameters.name: MoveOutMaxAgeEpochs

configuration-parameters.description: The amount of time data resides in WOS before the Tuple Mover triggers a moveout based on age (seconds)
configuration-parameters.name: MoveOutMaxAgeTime

configuration-parameters.description: The amount of WOS used before the Tuple Mover triggers a moveout based on utilization (percent)
configuration-parameters.name: MoveOutSizePct

configuration-parameters.description: Memory to allocate to per-node Prepass GroupBy Operator
configuration-parameters.name: NewEEGroupBySmallMemMB

configuration-parameters.description: Number of rows the EE will assign per thread when multiple threads are processing the same large ROS
configuration-parameters.name: NewEEROSSubdivisionRows

configuration-parameters.description: Number of threads the EE will attempt to use for processing (per plan)
configuration-parameters.name: NewEEThreads

configuration-parameters.description: Time to wait during shutdown, when auto recovery is not possible
configuration-parameters.name: NoRecoverShutdownWait

configuration-parameters.description: Use as recommended by Technical Support
configuration-parameters.name: OptVerticaOptions

configuration-parameters.description: If true use a DT per local segment, even when sorting
configuration-parameters.name: ParallelizeLocalSegmentLoad

configuration-parameters.description: Override the heap memory allocator for PCRE pattern matching library
configuration-parameters.name: PatternMatchAllocator

configuration-parameters.description: Sets the recursion limit for PCRE used by pattern matching.
configuration-parameters.name: PatternMatchingMatchLimitRecursion

configuration-parameters.description: The max number of rows per partition for pattern matching
configuration-parameters.name: PatternMatchingMaxPartition

configuration-parameters.description: The max number of matches per partition for pattern matching
configuration-parameters.name: PatternMatchingMaxPartitionMatches

configuration-parameters.description: The size of ovector for pcre_exec. Increase if using ANY_ROW and there are many subpattern groupings
configuration-parameters.name: PatternMatchingPerMatchWorkspaceSize

configuration-parameters.description: Use JIT for PCRE regex matching in queries
configuration-parameters.name: PatternMatchingUseJit

configuration-parameters.description: Override the stack memory allocator for PCRE pattern matching library
configuration-parameters.name: PatternMatchStackAllocator

configuration-parameters.description: Pin Vertica to given number of CPUs (-1 = no pin)
configuration-parameters.name: PinProcessors

configuration-parameters.description: Processor index to start with when pinning processors
configuration-parameters.name: PinProcessorsOffset

configuration-parameters.description: If set to true, allows creating unsegmented projection using pre-excavator style
configuration-parameters.name: PreExcavatorReplicatedProjection

configuration-parameters.description: Only load DataCollector records which satisfy time based predicates
configuration-parameters.name: PruneDataCollectorByTime

configuration-parameters.description: Only load system table columns which participate in the query into SysWOS
configuration-parameters.name: PruneSystemTableColumns

configuration-parameters.description: Maximum % of rows that may be deleted before Tuple Mover purges the ROS through mergeout
configuration-parameters.name: PurgeMergeoutPercent

configuration-parameters.description: The max amount of memory MIN/MAX for RANGE moving window can use in MB
configuration-parameters.name: RangeWindowMaxMem

configuration-parameters.description: Before starting recovery, perform cleanup of deleted files
configuration-parameters.name: ReapBeforeRecover

configuration-parameters.description: When recovering a projection with an identical buddy from scratch recovery may be able to directly copy storage containers if this feature is enabled
configuration-parameters.name: RecoverByContainer

configuration-parameters.description: Seconds to wait for dirty transactions before cancelling the session
configuration-parameters.name: RecoveryDirtyTxnWait

configuration-parameters.description: Trigger moveout automatically on commit of data to WOS
configuration-parameters.name: ReflexiveMoveout

configuration-parameters.description: When refreshing a projection from an identical buddy refresh may be able to directly copy storage containers if this feature is enabled
configuration-parameters.name: RefreshByContainer

configuration-parameters.description: Configure the buffer size (in Byte) for remote initiator to cache query result. Value zero will turn off the feature of routing one-executor query plan to remote initator
configuration-parameters.name: RemoteInitiatorBufSize

configuration-parameters.description: Interval between checking and removing unused database snapshots (seconds)
configuration-parameters.name: RemoveSnapshotInterval

configuration-parameters.description: Switch Replay Delete to use the new algorithm once runtime scan statistics exceeds the threshold
configuration-parameters.name: ReplayDeleteAlgorithmSwitchThreshold

configuration-parameters.description: Fraction of total resources that can be assigned to locally initiated requests; the remainder is only used by remote requests
configuration-parameters.name: ResLowLimPctOfHighLim

configuration-parameters.description: Restrict non-dbadmin users from viewing system-tables
configuration-parameters.name: RestrictSystemTables

configuration-parameters.description: Number of 64K ROS blocks that may be kept in the decompression cache (default is 4096 blocks; 256MB)
configuration-parameters.name: ROSCacheBlocks

configuration-parameters.description: Number of large (>64K) ROS blocks that may be kept in the decompression cache (for Grouped ROSs)
configuration-parameters.name: ROSCacheLargeBlocks

configuration-parameters.description: Maximum of number of ROSes in a stratum once reached merge out happens
configuration-parameters.name: ROSPerStratum

configuration-parameters.description: Set the query duration threshold in microseconds to save profiling information to the dc_execution_engine_profiles table.
configuration-parameters.name: SaveDCEEProfileThresholdUS

configuration-parameters.description: NONE (Default) MD5 and SHA512
configuration-parameters.name: SecurityAlgorithm

configuration-parameters.description: Auto projections will always be segmented. Default: true
configuration-parameters.name: SegmentAutoProjection

configuration-parameters.description: Create range segmentation on node_name for DataCollector tables
configuration-parameters.name: SegmentDataCollector

configuration-parameters.description: # Days. Delete closed session profiling data when data SessionProfilingAgeOut days old.
configuration-parameters.name: SessionProfilingAgeOut

configuration-parameters.description: If the average of the rows scanned squared during a delete is higher than this limit, a warning message about the projection is printed to the conole. Disable by setting to -1.
configuration-parameters.name: SlowDeleteConsoleWarningLimit

configuration-parameters.description: If the average of the rows scanned squared during a delete is higher than this limit, a warning message about the projection is printed to the vertica.log and saved in vs_comments. This limit is also used by evaluate_delete_performance to determine if a projection is likely to have slow delete performance. Disable by setting to -1. Console delete performance warnings will still be printed to log.
configuration-parameters.name: SlowDeleteSystemWarningLimit

configuration-parameters.description: Size per column below which a ROS is automatically stored grouped (bytes)
configuration-parameters.name: SmallROSSize

configuration-parameters.description: Least length of time (in seconds) a snapshot has existed for before systemTask tries to remove it
configuration-parameters.name: SnapshotRetentionTime

configuration-parameters.description: Where Vertica sends SNMP traps - 'host_name port CommunityString'. This is a comma-separated list.
configuration-parameters.name: SnmpTrapDestinationsList

configuration-parameters.description: List of events that Vertica traps: Low Disk Space, Read Only File System, Loss of K Safety, Current Fault Tolerance at Critical Level, Too Many ROS Containers, WOS Over Flow, Node State Change, Recovery Failure, Recovery Error, Recovery Lock Error, Recovery Projection Retrieval Error, Refresh Error, Tuple Mover Error, Stale Checkpoint
configuration-parameters.name: SnmpTrapEvents

configuration-parameters.description: Enable sending of SNMP traps
configuration-parameters.name: SnmpTrapsEnabled

configuration-parameters.description: SortCheck to generate SortCheck step in plan
configuration-parameters.name: SortCheckOption

configuration-parameters.description: Report Level for Sort Order violation. default for error. 0 for logging, 1 for error, 2 for panic
configuration-parameters.name: SortOrderReportLevel

configuration-parameters.description: Controls the number of Sort worker threads; 0 disables background threads
configuration-parameters.name: SortWorkerThreads

configuration-parameters.description: The server's SSL CA certificate
configuration-parameters.name: SSLCA

configuration-parameters.description: The server's SSL certificate
configuration-parameters.name: SSLCertificate

configuration-parameters.description: The server's SSL private key
configuration-parameters.name: SSLPrivateKey

configuration-parameters.description: Disable backslash quoting in string constants; required to conform to standard SQL
configuration-parameters.name: StandardConformingStrings

configuration-parameters.description: Sets the behavior to deal with undeclared UDx function parameters
configuration-parameters.name: StrictUDxParameterChecking

configuration-parameters.description: Enable event trapping for Syslog
configuration-parameters.name: SyslogEnabled

configuration-parameters.description: Low Disk Space, Read Only File System, Loss of K Safety, Current Fault Tolerance at Critical Level, Too Many ROS Containers, WOS Over Flow, Node State Change, Recovery Failure, Recovery Error, Recovery Lock Error, Recovery Projection Retrieval Error, Refresh Error, Tuple Mover Error, Stale Checkpoint
configuration-parameters.name: SyslogEvents

configuration-parameters.description: auth, uucp, authpriv (Linux only) local0, cron, local1, daemon, local2, ftp (Linux only) local3, lpr, local4, mail, local5, news, local6, user (default system) local7
configuration-parameters.name: SyslogFacility

configuration-parameters.description: Interval between system resource utilization monitoring checks (seconds)
configuration-parameters.name: SystemMonitorInterval

configuration-parameters.description: A message is logged if a monitored system resource changes by at least SystemMonitorThreshold (percent)
configuration-parameters.name: SystemMonitorThreshold

configuration-parameters.description: Turn on terraced (multi-level) data network routing if it would reduce stream count by this factor
configuration-parameters.name: TerraceRoutingFactor

configuration-parameters.description: When updating the index to account for deleted records in the source table, pre-compute the tokens for the deleted records. This takes time, but speeds up the actual deletion.
configuration-parameters.name: TextIndexComputeDeletedTokens

configuration-parameters.description: Default maximum size of tokens stored for text-indexing. Only affects new indices. Larger values will decrease the performance of the index.
configuration-parameters.name: TextIndexMaxTokenLength

configuration-parameters.description: The max amount of memory TopK(Heap) can use in MB
configuration-parameters.name: TopKHeapMaxMem

configuration-parameters.description: READ COMMITTED (Default) - Last epoch for reads and current epoch for writes. SERIALIZABLE - Current epoch for reads and writes
configuration-parameters.name: TransactionIsolationLevel

configuration-parameters.description: Determines whether the transaction is read/write or read-only. Read/write is the default
configuration-parameters.name: TransactionMode

configuration-parameters.description: Trust pk and unique constraint as guarantee of uniqueness
configuration-parameters.name: TrustConstraintsAsUnique

configuration-parameters.description: Number of seconds to wait for UDx to finish a block of data before give up
configuration-parameters.name: UDxFencedBlockTimeout

configuration-parameters.description: Number of seconds to wait for UDx to finish cancel related clean up work
configuration-parameters.name: UDxFencedCancelTimeout

configuration-parameters.description: Number of seconds to wait for external procedures in UDx fenced mode
configuration-parameters.name: UDxFencedExternalProcedureTimeout

configuration-parameters.description: Optimizer uses modular hash for resegmenting intermediate results.
configuration-parameters.name: UseModularHashForReseg

configuration-parameters.description: Optimizer only considers redistribution choices which are cost model resilient.
configuration-parameters.name: UseOnlyResilientRedistribution

configuration-parameters.description: Include virtual table data from recovering nodes in monitoring query results
configuration-parameters.name: UseRecoveringNodesInVirtualTableQueries

configuration-parameters.description: Use safer decompression scheme to reduce the chance of crashes if disk data has been corrupted
configuration-parameters.name: UseSafeDecompression

configuration-parameters.description: Use 5.0-style truncating integer division for the '/' operator
configuration-parameters.name: UseV50IntegerDivision

configuration-parameters.description: Execute the external procedures in the zygote process
configuration-parameters.name: UseZygoteForExternalProcedures

configuration-parameters.description: Create a log entry each time a client opens a connection and closes it immediately; load balancers often do this for a health check
configuration-parameters.name: WarnOnIncompleteStartupPacket

configuration-parameters.description: Use materialization strategy to support the WITH clause
configuration-parameters.name: WithClauseMaterialization
